column5: I just got word today that my current employment contract will not be renewed and will end next Friday. Nice of them to do to me when just 2 weeks ago I was told that I would be pretty much guaranteed to be extended until at least August, with the strong possibility of being hired into a permanent position.  Needless to say, they gave me a LITTLE less notice then they said they would in the case of my contract not being renewed.  Anyone know of a place who is looking for a Web Developer?? Or anyone need a website done?  Any help is much appreciated.
that sucks man.  hope you can find work soon.  maybe send head hunter a message he may be able to help since its kind of what he does lol  cheers!
Collect ei and fish everyday.  Thats what I would do.  Just a thought.

that sucks Stoty....mind you they always keep ya guessing till the end...barstewards that they are.  I like the sound of the earlier suggestion...."collect EI and fish everyday", for a little while ...thats what i might do....good luck with the job hunt, pretty sure you  'll get something.

Have you put your resume up on http://www.linkedin.com  and looked up and made connections to all your old colleagues?  There is an art to getting yourself noticed on this site so have a good read through other peoples profiles, and also do a search about linkedin techniques.  Once you get rolling on this site, opportunities will find you pretty quick, it's not like monsterosity or work-o-polis

Stoty; I was offered a position at the casino as a web development manager which I turned down cause it was contract. It is still running as an internal position, but likely will go public next week. Keep an eye on the website for fallsviewcasinoresort.com and see if it comes up. Sounds like a cool gig...more about developing then actually building anything and marketting. I've had 3 web job offers from the states in the last few months, but oddly enough nothing in Canada has been coming around. I've been slow myself, but PM me and I can get you some side stuff and probably some maintenance stuff for me.

I got laid off from the cutomer service indusrty a few years back, went on EI had them pay for school and now i'm in a trade, thats an option for you! My brother is disabled and was with the government for 2.75 years, at 3 years they must make you permanent full time, they laid him off 2 weeks before the deadline.
PM me Stoty... I have two full time and one contract position available ... downtown. HH

Way to go community  I'm simply amazed at all the good will that this place generates. And I've only been a member a short time.  Now everyone pat themselves on the back and the fish gods will reward those with a giant musky
WOW the community itself here is a great networking tool.  GoodLuck in the future Stoty!  Going on EI and fishing for a while isnt soo bad. My buddy is doing it now, as hes concentrating on going PRO
You may want to check out this quick link that condenses the Workopolis job board:  Click  Here
Im also very impressed by the community.  Kudos to Rick and HH for reaching out to a fellow member in need!
just sent u a request for quote on my company website. Splashopper
